Lerritans are unstoppable giants with skin of volcanic glass and blood of roiling lava. These malicious arsonists would see the world burned to a cinder. They pay homage to [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=108), the evil elemental demigod of fire, and they bully other fiery creatures. When the urge to immolate grows too great to ignore, lerritans burn forests, destroy villages, and boil rivers, but they avoid large bodies of water. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Lerritan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=715) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 159 2.0 **Perception** +35; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +41, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +36, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +38 **Str** +10 **Dex** +5 **Con** +7 **Int** +2 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 46 **Fort** +38 **Ref** +34 **Will** +36 **HP** 490 **Immunities** fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Resistances** piercing 20, slashing 20 **Weaknesses** cold 20 **Tenacious Flames** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 100 feet. Creatures in the emanation
cannot recover from [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 50 feet **Melee** warhammer +40 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 4d12+18 bludgeoning plus 2d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Melee** jaws +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+18 piercing plus 2d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Ranged** rock +39 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 4d6+18 bludgeoning plus 2d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 46 - **Cantrips (10th)** [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to the Material Plane, [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=6), or [Plane of Earth](/Planes.aspx?ID=5) only) - **8th** [Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) - **9th** [Meteor Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=191), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) - **10th** [Cataclysm](/Spells.aspx?ID=32) **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** A lerritan can break stony scales off its body to throw; these scales reform at the end of each round, so the lerritan is never without a supply of rocks to hurl. **Volcanic Eruption** ([Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The volcano on the lerritan's back erupts and sends lava bombs raining down in a 30-foot emanation, dealing 12d12 fire damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a DC 46 Reflex saving throw. The lava globules quickly cool into heavy stones, transforming the area into greater difficult terrain for non-lerritans. The lerritan can't use Volcanic Eruption for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage and is [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) (Escape DC 46).
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage and is encased in a rocky crust with lava on the inside. The creature is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) (Escape DC 46), can't breathe, takes 3d12 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and can't recover from this persistent fire damage until freed.
Lerritan Cavalcades Every few decades, lerritans gather in large bands to travel from one volcanic region to another, razing every sign of civilization they find along the way. Lerritan cavalcades contain up to a dozen lerritans and their lackeys: [crimson worms](/Monsters.aspx?ID=75), powerful [fire elementals](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=43), and [fire giants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=223)
